targets.rawSql:
WITH fills AS (
  SELECT 
    trade_id,
    action,
    price,
    shares,
    side,
    commission,
    time,
    ticker
  FROM "trades"
  WHERE hash = '$hash_id'
    AND time >= $__timeFrom
    AND time <= $__timeTo
),
trade_aggregates AS (
  SELECT 
    trade_id,
    ticker,
    MAX(side) as side,
    MIN(CASE WHEN action IN ('buy_to_open', 'sell_to_open') THEN time END) as entry_time,
    MAX(CASE WHEN action IN ('sell_to_close', 'buy_to_close') THEN time END) as exit_time,
    SUM(CASE WHEN action IN ('buy_to_open', 'sell_to_open') THEN price * shares ELSE 0 END) as entry_value,
    SUM(CASE WHEN action IN ('sell_to_close', 'buy_to_close') THEN price * shares ELSE 0 END) as exit_value,
    SUM(commission) as total_commission
  FROM fills
  GROUP BY trade_id, ticker
),
trade_metrics AS (
  SELECT 
    trade_id,
    entry_time,
    exit_time,
    EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (exit_time - entry_time)) / 86400.0 as hold_duration_days,
    CASE 
      WHEN side = 'LONG' THEN exit_value - entry_value - total_commission
      ELSE entry_value - exit_value - total_commission
    END as pnl,
    CASE 
      WHEN entry_value > 0 THEN 
        CASE 
          WHEN side = 'LONG' THEN (exit_value - entry_value - total_commission) / entry_value * 100.0
          ELSE (entry_value - exit_value - total_commission) / entry_value * 100.0
        END
      ELSE NULL
    END as return_pct
  FROM trade_aggregates
  WHERE exit_time IS NOT NULL AND entry_value > 0
),
backtest_period AS (
  SELECT 
    MIN(time) as start_time,
    MAX(time) as end_time,
    EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (MAX(time) - MIN(time))) / 86400.0 as duration_days
  FROM fills
),
exposure_time AS (
  SELECT 
    SUM(hold_duration_days) as total_exposure_days
  FROM trade_metrics
),
equity_curve AS (
  SELECT 
    exit_time as time,
    SUM(pnl) OVER (ORDER BY exit_time) as cumulative_pnl,
    100000.0 + SUM(pnl) OVER (ORDER BY exit_time) as equity
  FROM trade_metrics
  ORDER BY exit_time
),
equity_stats AS (
  SELECT 
    MAX(equity) as equity_peak,
    (SELECT equity FROM equity_curve ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1) as equity_final
  FROM equity_curve
),
drawdowns AS (
  SELECT 
    time,
    equity,
    MAX(equity) OVER (ORDER BY time ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) as running_peak,
    CASE 
      WHEN MAX(equity) OVER (ORDER BY time ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) > 0 THEN
        (equity - MAX(equity) OVER (ORDER BY time ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW)) / MAX(equity) OVER (ORDER BY time ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) * 100.0
      ELSE 0.0
    END as drawdown_pct
  FROM equity_curve
),
drawdown_periods AS (
  SELECT 
    time,
    drawdown_pct,
    LAG(drawdown_pct) OVER (ORDER BY time) as prev_drawdown,
    CASE 
      WHEN drawdown_pct < 0 AND (LAG(drawdown_pct) OVER (ORDER BY time) >= 0 OR LAG(drawdown_pct) OVER (ORDER BY time) IS NULL) THEN 1
      ELSE 0
    END as drawdown_start
  FROM drawdowns
),
drawdown_groups AS (
  SELECT 
    time,
    drawdown_pct,
    SUM(drawdown_start) OVER (ORDER BY time) as drawdown_group_id
  FROM drawdown_periods
  WHERE drawdown_pct < 0
),
drawdown_metrics AS (
  SELECT 
    MIN(drawdown_pct) as max_drawdown_pct,
    AVG(drawdown_pct) as avg_drawdown_pct,
    EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (MAX(time) - MIN(time))) / 86400.0 as max_drawdown_duration_days
  FROM drawdown_groups
  GROUP BY drawdown_group_id
),
all_drawdown_durations AS (
  SELECT 
    EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (MAX(time) - MIN(time))) / 86400.0 as drawdown_duration_days
  FROM drawdown_groups
  GROUP BY drawdown_group_id
),
trade_stats AS (
  SELECT 
    COUNT(*) as num_trades,
    CASE 
      WHEN COUNT(*) > 0 THEN COUNT(CASE WHEN pnl > 0 THEN 1 END) * 100.0 / COUNT(*)
      ELSE 0.0
    END as win_rate_pct,
    MAX(return_pct) as best_trade_pct,
    MIN(return_pct) as worst_trade_pct,
    AVG(return_pct) as avg_trade_pct,
    MAX(hold_duration_days) as max_trade_duration_days,
    AVG(hold_duration_days) as avg_trade_duration_days,
    CASE 
      WHEN SUM(CASE WHEN pnl < 0 THEN ABS(pnl) ELSE 0 END) > 0 THEN
        SUM(CASE WHEN pnl > 0 THEN pnl ELSE 0 END) / SUM(CASE WHEN pnl < 0 THEN ABS(pnl) ELSE 0 END)
      ELSE 0.0
    END as profit_factor,
    AVG(return_pct) as expectancy_pct
  FROM trade_metrics
),
returns_calc AS (
  SELECT 
    (es.equity_final - 100000.0) / 100000.0 * 100.0 as return_pct,
    CASE 
      WHEN bp.duration_days > 0 THEN
        (POWER(es.equity_final / 100000.0, 365.0 / bp.duration_days) - 1.0) * 100.0
      ELSE 0.0
    END as return_ann_pct
  FROM equity_stats es, backtest_period bp
),
volatility_calc AS (
  SELECT 
    CASE 
      WHEN COUNT(*) > 1 AND MIN(bp.duration_days) > 0 THEN
        SQRT(
          (
            AVG(tm.return_pct * tm.return_pct)
            - AVG(tm.return_pct) * AVG(tm.return_pct)
          ) * 365.0 / MIN(bp.duration_days)
        ) * 100.0
      ELSE 0.0
    END as volatility_ann_pct
  FROM trade_metrics tm, backtest_period bp
),
buy_hold_return AS (
  SELECT 
    0.0 as buy_hold_return_pct
)
SELECT 
  CONCAT(
    LPAD(EXTRACT(YEAR FROM bp.start_time)::VARCHAR, 4, '0'), '-',
    LPAD(EXTRACT(MONTH FROM bp.start_time)::VARCHAR, 2, '0'), '-',
    LPAD(EXTRACT(DAY FROM bp.start_time)::VARCHAR, 2, '0'), ' ',
    LPAD(EXTRACT(HOUR FROM bp.start_time)::VARCHAR, 2, '0'), ':',
    LPAD(EXTRACT(MINUTE FROM bp.start_time)::VARCHAR, 2, '0'), ':',
    LPAD(EXTRACT(SECOND FROM bp.start_time)::VARCHAR, 2, '0')
  ) as start,
  CONCAT(
    LPAD(EXTRACT(YEAR FROM bp.end_time)::VARCHAR, 4, '0'), '-',
    LPAD(EXTRACT(MONTH FROM bp.end_time)::VARCHAR, 2, '0'), '-',
    LPAD(EXTRACT(DAY FROM bp.end_time)::VARCHAR, 2, '0'), ' ',
    LPAD(EXTRACT(HOUR FROM bp.end_time)::VARCHAR, 2, '0'), ':',
    LPAD(EXTRACT(MINUTE FROM bp.end_time)::VARCHAR, 2, '0'), ':',
    LPAD(EXTRACT(SECOND FROM bp.end_time)::VARCHAR, 2, '0')
  ) as end,
  bp.duration_days as duration,
  CASE 
    WHEN bp.duration_days > 0 THEN
      (et.total_exposure_days / bp.duration_days) * 100.0
    ELSE 0.0
  END as exposure_time_pct,
  es.equity_final as equity_final,
  es.equity_peak as equity_peak,
  rc.return_pct as return_pct,
  COALESCE(bhr.buy_hold_return_pct, 0.0) as buy_hold_return_pct,
  rc.return_ann_pct as return_ann_pct,
  vc.volatility_ann_pct as volatility_ann_pct,
  COALESCE((SELECT MIN(max_drawdown_pct) FROM drawdown_metrics), 0.0) as max_drawdown_pct,
  COALESCE((SELECT AVG(avg_drawdown_pct) FROM drawdown_metrics), 0.0) as avg_drawdown_pct,
  COALESCE((SELECT MAX(max_drawdown_duration_days) FROM drawdown_metrics), 0.0) as max_drawdown_duration,
  COALESCE((SELECT AVG(drawdown_duration_days) FROM all_drawdown_durations), 0.0) as avg_drawdown_duration,
  ts.num_trades as num_trades,
  ts.win_rate_pct as win_rate_pct,
  ts.best_trade_pct as best_trade_pct,
  ts.worst_trade_pct as worst_trade_pct,
  ts.avg_trade_pct as avg_trade_pct,
  ts.max_trade_duration_days as max_trade_duration,
  ts.avg_trade_duration_days as avg_trade_duration,
  ts.profit_factor as profit_factor,
  ts.expectancy_pct as expectancy_pct
FROM backtest_period bp
CROSS JOIN exposure_time et
CROSS JOIN equity_stats es
CROSS JOIN returns_calc rc
CROSS JOIN volatility_calc vc
CROSS JOIN trade_stats ts
CROSS JOIN buy_hold_return bhr
LIMIT 1

WITH fills AS (
  SELECT 
    trade_id,
    action,
    price,
    shares,
    side,
    commission,
    time,
    ticker
  FROM "trades"
  WHERE hash = '$hash_id'
    AND time >= $__timeFrom
    AND time <= $__timeTo
),
trade_aggregates AS (
  SELECT 
    trade_id,
    ticker,
    MAX(side) as side,
    SUM(CASE WHEN action IN ('buy_to_open', 'sell_to_open') THEN price * shares ELSE 0 END) as entry_value,
    SUM(CASE WHEN action IN ('sell_to_close', 'buy_to_close') THEN price * shares ELSE 0 END) as exit_value,
    SUM(commission) as total_commission,
    MAX(CASE WHEN action IN ('sell_to_close', 'buy_to_close') THEN time END) as exit_time
  FROM fills
  GROUP BY trade_id, ticker
),
trade_metrics AS (
  SELECT 
    exit_time as time,
    CASE 
      WHEN side = 'LONG' THEN exit_value - entry_value - total_commission
      ELSE entry_value - exit_value - total_commission
    END as pnl
  FROM trade_aggregates
  WHERE exit_time IS NOT NULL AND entry_value > 0
),
equity_curve AS (
  SELECT 
    time,
    100000.0 + SUM(pnl) OVER (ORDER BY time) as equity
  FROM trade_metrics
  ORDER BY time
)
SELECT
  time,
  ((equity - 100000.0) / 100000.0) * 100.0 as cumulative_return_pct
FROM equity_curve
ORDER BY time

WITH fills AS (
  SELECT 
    trade_id,
    action,
    price,
    shares,
    side,
    commission,
    time,
    ticker
  FROM "trades"
  WHERE hash = '$hash_id'
    AND time >= $__timeFrom
    AND time <= $__timeTo
),
trade_aggregates AS (
  SELECT 
    trade_id,
    ticker,
    MAX(side) as side,
    SUM(CASE WHEN action IN ('buy_to_open', 'sell_to_open') THEN price * shares ELSE 0 END) as entry_value,
    SUM(CASE WHEN action IN ('sell_to_close', 'buy_to_close') THEN price * shares ELSE 0 END) as exit_value,
    SUM(commission) as total_commission,
    MAX(CASE WHEN action IN ('sell_to_close', 'buy_to_close') THEN time END) as exit_time
  FROM fills
  GROUP BY trade_id, ticker
),
trade_metrics AS (
  SELECT 
    exit_time as time,
    CASE 
      WHEN entry_value > 0 THEN 
        CASE 
          WHEN side = 'LONG' THEN (exit_value - entry_value - total_commission) / entry_value * 100.0
          ELSE (entry_value - exit_value - total_commission) / entry_value * 100.0
        END
      ELSE NULL
    END as return_pct
  FROM trade_aggregates
  WHERE exit_time IS NOT NULL AND entry_value > 0
)
SELECT
  time,
  return_pct
FROM trade_metrics
ORDER BY time

WITH fills AS (
  SELECT 
    trade_id,
    action,
    price,
    shares,
    side,
    commission,
    time,
    ticker
  FROM "trades"
  WHERE hash = '$hash_id'
    AND time >= $__timeFrom
    AND time <= $__timeTo
),
trade_aggregates AS (
  SELECT 
    trade_id,
    ticker,
    MAX(side) as side,
    SUM(CASE WHEN action IN ('buy_to_open', 'sell_to_open') THEN price * shares ELSE 0 END) as entry_value,
    SUM(CASE WHEN action IN ('sell_to_close', 'buy_to_close') THEN price * shares ELSE 0 END) as exit_value,
    SUM(commission) as total_commission,
    MAX(CASE WHEN action IN ('sell_to_close', 'buy_to_close') THEN time END) as exit_time
  FROM fills
  GROUP BY trade_id, ticker
),
trade_metrics AS (
  SELECT 
    exit_time as time,
    CASE 
      WHEN side = 'LONG' THEN exit_value - entry_value - total_commission
      ELSE entry_value - exit_value - total_commission
    END as pnl
  FROM trade_aggregates
  WHERE exit_time IS NOT NULL AND entry_value > 0
)
SELECT
  time,
  100000.0 + SUM(pnl) OVER (ORDER BY time) as equity
FROM trade_metrics
ORDER BY time

SELECT 
  *
FROM "trades"
WHERE hash = '$hash_id'
  AND time >= $__timeFrom
  AND time <= $__timeTo
LIMIT 1
